  • Method Details

    • mapQueryResult

      static <T> krystal.VirtualPromise<Stream<T>> mapQueryResult(QueryResultInterface qr, Class<T> clazz)
      Convert rows of QueryResultInterface data into stream of objects, using their @Reader annotated constructors. The types of argument of particular constructor must match the data type of each column in the QueryResultInterface row. There can be a number of @Readers, i.e. each responsible for handling different ProviderInterface. The class can be declared as @Vertical, in case which, the QueryResultInterface will be un-pivoted first.
      See Also:
      • QueryResultInterface.unpivot(ColumnInterface, ColumnInterface, ColumnInterface...)

    • getFilter

      default Function<SelectStatement, WhereClause> getFilter()

      Get the Loader query, applying additional StatementModifiers id any.

    • getVerticalMandatoryAnnotations

      static Map<Class<? extends Annotation>, ColumnInterface> getVerticalMandatoryAnnotations(Class<?> clazz)
      If the values are missing, throws RuntimeException.

    • getTable

      default TableInterface getTable()
      TableInterface (database table) linked with object's persistence. Each row of table represents a single object, unless class is @Vertical. You can use Lombok to set a @Getter marked field - in that case also mark it with @Skip. As being a method, you can condition its output on values of other fields that can be Skipped.
      See Also:
      • TableInterface

    • getTable

      static Optional<TableInterface> getTable(Class<?> clazz)

      default ProviderInterface getProvider()
      Can be overridden, declared with @Provider, or
      invalid reference 
      KrystalFramework#getDefaultProvider()
      as default.

    • getLoader

      static <T> SelectStatement getLoader(Class<? extends T> clazz, @Nullable T invokeTarget)
      Returns SelectStatement used to loadFromDatabase(ColumnsComparisonInterface[]) instance of an object of provided class, or default, or throws error if for some reason it's missing.
      See Also:

    • copyFrom

      default <T> void copyFrom(T another)
      Copy fields values based on their names from another object. Passes through visibility restrictions. Any non-matching will be skipped.

    • fld

      default Field fld(String fieldName)
      Convenient way to return field from this class. Usage: this.fld("fieldName").

    • hashKeys

      static String hashKeys(Class<?> clazz, Map<Field,Object> fieldsToValues)
      Create individual String representation for provided class and fields values. Limit to fields which have Key annotation present or take all fields if not.

      default String hashKeys()

    • getPersistenceSetupAnnotations

      static List<Class<? extends Annotation>> getPersistenceSetupAnnotations()
      All Persistence-setup related annotations, values of which can be derived from fields or methods. Used mainly in fields-filtering during reflection.
